author: Newstral.com
title: Al Jazeera: «Netanyahu says strikes will continue in Lebanon ‘with full force’» - Related news - Newstral.com
text: Newstral Article [Al Jazeera](/en/sources/40) on 2024-09-26 22:56 Netanyahu says strikes will continue in Lebanon ‘with full force’ Related news [Netanyahu clarifies: 'Report of cease-fire incorrect; directed IDF to continue fighting with full force'](https://www.ynetnews.com/article/s1qw52ma0)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249)[Netanyahu Says Gaza Military Campaign Will Continue ‘Full Force’ As UN Chief Calls For Immediate Ceasefire](https://www.forbes.com/sites/jemimamcevoy/2021/05/16/netanyahu-says-gaza-military-campaign-will-continue-full-force-as-un-chief-calls-for-immediate-ceasefire/)[Forbes](/en/sources/2783)[Netanyahu rejects calls for ceasefire, says Israel’s battle against Hamas will continue with ‘full force’](https://www.scmp.com/news/world/middle-east/article/3241228/netanyahu-rejects-calls-ceasefire-says-israels-battle-against-hamas-will-continue-full-force?utm_source=rss_feed)[South China Morning Post](/en/sources/238),,,,[Netanyahu to Push Immunity Law 'With Full Force,' Report Says](https://www.haaretz.com/us-news/netanyahu-to-push-immunity-law-with-full-force-report-says-1.7248390)[Haaretz](/en/sources/39)[Netanyahu: war on Hezbollah to continue until objectives met](https://www.ynetnews.com/article/rkcf00l7r0)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249)['Netanyahu weak on Lebanon'](http://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-4620861,00.html)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249)[Israeli Air Force strikes southern Lebanon - report](https://www.jpost.com/breaking-news/israeli-air-force-strikes-southern-lebanon-report-675867)[The Jerusalem Post (JPost.com)](/en/sources/277)[Israel will continue Syria strikes despite S-300, Netanyahu tells Moscow](https://www.timesofisrael.com/israel-will-continue-syria-strikes-despite-s-300-netanyahu-tells-moscow/)[timesofisrael.com](/en/sources/198758)[Israeli Air Force strikes targets in Lebanon](https://www.jpost.com/breaking-news/article-777180)[The Jerusalem Post (JPost.com)](/en/sources/277)[Israeli strikes on Lebanon causing ‘carnage’, health minister says](https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c748n1258z1o)[BBC](/en/sources/30)[Netanyahu says he ordered IDF to continue ‘massive strikes’ in Gaza](https://www.timesofisrael.com/netanyahu-says-he-ordered-idf-to-continue-massive-strikes-in-gaza/)[timesofisrael.com](/en/sources/198758)[Netanyahu says air strikes on Gaza could ‘continue for some time’](https://www.watoday.com.au/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-airstrikes-on-gaza-could-continue-for-some-time-20210511-p57qxt.html?ref=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss_feed)[Sydney Morning Herald](/en/sources/228)[At least 35 dead in Gaza strikes as Netanyahu says war will continue for months](https://www.shropshirestar.com/news/world-news/2023/12/31/at-least-35-dead-in-gaza-strikes-as-netanyahu-says-war-will-continue-for-months/)[Shropshire Star](/en/sources/30276),,,,[Israeli strikes in central Gaza as Netanyahu says war will continue for months](https://www.reviewjournal.com/news/nation-and-world/israeli-strikes-in-central-gaza-as-netanyahu-says-war-will-continue-for-months-2973834/)[reviewjournal.com](/en/sources/28810),,,,[Israel strikes Gaza after truce expires, in clear sign that war has resumed in full force](https://www.thenewstribune.com/news/nation-world/national/article282544808.html#storylink=rss)[thenewstribune.com](/en/sources/3125),,,,[Netanyahu rejects calls for ceasefire as battle continues with ‘full force’](https://www.expressandstar.com/news/world-news/2023/11/11/netanyahu-rejects-calls-for-ceasefire-as-battle-continues-with-full-force/)[expressandstar.com](/en/sources/30252),,,,[Netanyahu: Ground offensive continues with full force, essential to reach objectives](https://www.ynetnews.com/article/bkgnxzyra)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249),,,,[Netanyahu Stands by Trump: Israel Working 'Full-Force' with U.S. Despite Syria Pullout](https://www.breitbart.com/middle-east/2018/12/23/netanyahu-stands-by-trump-israel-working-full-force-with-u-s-despite-syria-pullout/)[breitbart.com](/en/sources/222142),,,,
